DOC.brief_summary: We investigate whether mitomycin C treatment previous filtration surgery induce P-glycoprotein expression .
DOC.brief_title: Multidrug Resistance After Trabeculectomy With Mitomycin C
DOC.detailed_description: Despite adjuvant use mitomycin C trabeculectomy , short-term long-term failure still occur . We investigate whether mitomycin C treatment previous trabeculectomy induces P-glycoprotein expression . Expression P-glycoprotein analyse surgically remove Tenon tissue use immunohistochemistry .
DOC.criteria: patient plan trabeculectomy elevate eye pressure one third patient without previous trabeculectomy two third patient previous trabeculectomy ( one third one third without use mitomycin C ) patient require surgery patient plan surgery elevate eye pressure trabeculectomy
